parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The accelerated domain name. You can specify multiple domain names and separate them with commas (,). You can specify up to 500 domain names in each request. The query results of multiple domain names are aggregated. If you do not specify a domain name, data of all domain names is queried.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

> The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description:
The time interval between the data entries. Unit: seconds.

The time granularity varies with the maximum time range per query. Valid values: 300 (5 minutes), 3600 (1 hour), and 86400 (1 day). For more information, see **Usage notes**.

parameters.name: IspNameEn
parameters.description: The name of the ISP. You can call the DescribeDcdnRegionAndIsp operation to query the ISP name. If you do not specify a value for this parameter, all ISPs are queried.

parameters.name: Layer
parameters.description: The layers at which you want to query the QPS. The network layer supports IPv4 and IPv6. The application layer supports http, https, and quic. You can also set the value to all. Default value: all.

parameters.name: LocationNameEn
parameters.description: The name of the region. You can call the DescribeDcdnRegionAndIsp operation to query the region name. If you do not specify a value for this parameter, all regions are queried.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. The minimum data granularity is 5 minutes. If you do not set this parameter, data in the last 24 hours is queried.
